attributes.action: Independant complaints commision or governing body for the RSPCA
attributes.additional_details: The RSPCA are targeting hunting men and calling for unfair prosecutions based on their biased views not evidence. As a registered charity they have no body to answer to and are being left to bully and intimidate honest hunting people. We are calling for an independent complaints commission to be appointed to the RSPCA so that people have somewhere to turn if they feel they are being treated unfairly.
